original_title: NBRO issues landslide warnings for Colombo, Ratnapura, and Kegalle districts
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – The National Building Research Organisation has issued early landslide warnings to several divisional secretariats in the Colombo, Ratnapura, and Kegalle districts.
The warnings will be in effect until 08:30 pm on Tuesday (13).
